title: Ticket #7762: CumulativeRemoteUserCpu does not accumulate over checkpoints
description:
CumulativeRemoteUserCpu does not seem to accumulate for jobs using periodic self-checkpointing (i.e. https://htcondor.readthedocs.io/en/latest/users-manual/self-checkpointing-applications.html).

E.g., running a job with an expected CPU Time of ~10 hours and checkpoint period of 1 hour, I see the following CumulativeRemoteUserCpu / RemoteWallClockTime with and without checkpointing:

no checkpointing: ~10 hours / ~10 hours

with checkpointing: ~1 hour / ~10 hours

However, the expected functionality (accumulation of CPUTime over checkpoints in CumulativeRemoteUserCpu) is present for singularity jobs.

This is also described in https://github.com/lscsoft/osg-igwn/issues/220
